name: batiyoun-monorepo
description: End-to-end encrypted Progressive Web App for private messaging
author: Kush Kumar <kushkumar.officialsoftwaredev@gmail.com>

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w client" "npm run dev -w server" --names "CLIENT,SERVER" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
scripts.build: npm run build -w common && npm run build -w client && npm run build -w server
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules common/node_modules client/.next server/dist common/dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w client && npm run lint -w server
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w client && npm run type-check -w server
